title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1725-1.2 - Loan contract
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 1725-1.2 - Loan contract

State Regulations

The basic references regarding the financing of a
housing company are: (a) building
loan agreement; (b) mortgage; and
(c) mortgage note. These documents
are executed by and between the housing company and the lending agency or
banking institution. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
1725-1.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
